name: Revival of a Dead Planet
description:
Created for the Ludum Dare 36 Jam.

You are exploring an ancient facility on an alien world. However, get those doors open, you will have to restore power to the facilities energy circuits. However, those circuits also power the facility's security systems.'

A short 3D Action-Adventure game.

Default Controls
-------------------
Movement - WASD
Interact - E
Rotate Camera - Mouse
Pause - Space
